Saeed Saleh nke a makwaara dịka Sa'eed Saleh Ibrahim; (Arabic) (July 31, 1940 -August 1, 2014) bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe ọchị kacha mma n'Egypt
Saleh nwetara nzere bachelọ nke nka na Mahadum Cairo n'afọ 1960

A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ihe nkiri ya na Al Ayal Kibrit na Madrast Al-Mushaghebeen yana ime ihe nkiri na nke atọ n'ime ihe nkiri ndị Egypt na-eme ka ọ bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị eme ihe nkiri n'ụwa.
A tụrụ ya mkpọrọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 1995 ruo otu afọ, n'ihi na o nwere ọgwụ ọjọọ. N'afọ 2010, ya na Adel Emam mere ihe nkiri Alzheimer, mgbe ọ na-arịa ọrịa Alzheimer.
Ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2014 ma e lie ya n'obodo ya, Majiria, Monufia Governorate.
